label: 翁問答
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: [Work written by Nakae Tōju] at the age of thirty-three, [in which] he explained in a simple fashion the essential points of Chu Hsi Neo-Confucianism as they applied to actual life (p. 417). [中江藤樹、朱子学]
